title: Article Managing
description: A system to manage and organize project articles displayed on a website, enabling easy content updates and dynamic rendering without needing backend changes.

title: Personal portfolio
description: My personal website is my creative playground, a space where I express myself through code, explore the art of web development, and share what I love to build.

title: RAG System for PDF Documents
description: This project implements a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system that allows querying PDF documents using LLMs. It parses PDFs, stores semantic embeddings in a vector database, and generates accurate answers via OpenAI and DeepSeek models.

title: Test3
description: A brief description of project 3, demonstrating the use of various web technologies in creating a dynamic and responsive application.
